# Test that changing routes function name leaves old files (to allow coexistence)

# Generate with first routes function
muxt generate --output-routes-func=TemplateRoutes --output-multiple-files

exists index_template_routes_gen.go
exists template_routes.go
grep 'func TemplateRoutes' template_routes.go

# Change routes function name - old files should remain
muxt generate --output-routes-func=AdminRoutes --output-file=admin_routes.go --output-multiple-files

# Both sets of files should exist
exists index_template_routes_gen.go
exists template_routes.go
exists admin_routes.go

grep 'func TemplateRoutes' template_routes.go
grep 'func AdminRoutes' admin_routes.go

# Clean up old files by regenerating with old routes function name
muxt generate --output-routes-func=TemplateRoutes --output-multiple-files

# Old files should be updated, new routes function files should remain
exists index_template_routes_gen.go
exists template_routes.go
exists admin_routes.go
